           double _dLat,

           double _dDec,
           double _dAsc)
        Mathematics Constructor
        Parameters:
        _date - : Date of the computer. Will be use to calculate the Sideral Time
        _dLat - : It's the Latitude of the star's pointer
        _dLon - : It's the Longitude of the star's pointer
        _dDec - : It's the Declination of the star
        _dAsc - : It's the Ascension of the star
